website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX9 is a lot of camera--with solid shooting performance and photo and movie quality--for the money.
pros: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-WX9 offers excellent features for automatic snapshots and speedy shooting performance, and nice photo and video quality for its class
cons: The WX9's controls might be too small for some users and its photos aren't sharp enough for pixel peepers

customer_reviews.title: The video is fantastic and the photos are equally amazing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera three years ago and i surpasses most cameras today (2017). The video is fantastic and the photos are equally amazing. The camera is simple to use. The onnly thing I would change is the location of the movie button. This is a minor point and newer Sony cameras have the movie button on top for easy use. The Zeiss lense is without equal and a 5 powerr true optical zoom is adequate for most situations. The digital zoom is okay, but pixelation can become a factor. I rarely use the 16 megapixel setting except for very unique photos. 5 megapixels is fine for almost everything I shoot. Would definitely buy again and recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: f4jock

customer_reviews.title: Great Lightweight Camera for Low Light Situations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera because of it's good reviews for use in low light situations, and it did not disappoint. I used my previous camera at one of my children's graduation in a large auditorium, and the majority of the pictures came out very dark, even with the flash on. I used this camera at the next graduation, and the difference was noticeable. No more dark pictures. It is also small and lightweight. I bought a soft shell zipper case for it and normally carry it in my purse. It's light and takes up very little room. Great camera, great picture quality, and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Deck

customer_reviews.title: Sony DSCWX9/BBDL 16.2 MP CMOS Sensor with 5 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera Bundle Black
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera, offers very good resolution, the pictures show vivid colors, panoramic shots are excellent and prosesan faster, 3D shots are very good. The videos are excellent and the audio too. The camera offers settings for different shots in different scenarios. The photographs in dark places do very well. Cons: The digital zoom is good but must improve to take pictures over long distances. The battery lasts a very short but this is solved by buying another battery. Conclusion: Excellent camera, very fast and very good for taking photographs is a pocket camera. Excellent seller, the purchase was made ​​without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but I decided on an upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the Sony dsc-hx7v at the same time. Other reviewers have already covered pros and cons so i'll just mention why I returned the wx9. I decided to keep the hx7v and was convinced the $70 difference over the dsc-wx9 was well worth it. I took pictures of the same scenes with both cameras and the hx7v just seemed to take sharper pictures overall. I also noticed the hx7v had a much better flash (brighter and farther range than the wx9) and the 10x zoom came in handy many times. These are the main factors that made me return the wx9.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Point and Shoot Camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera after my Sony Cyber-Shot DSC T100 decided to die on me. After extensive research, I finally selected this camera and I am happy with my decision. The picture quality is incredible and there are a lot of features, that even after owning this for a year, I have yet to really utilize. One really cool setting is the panoramic setting - the outcome is incredible! Another one is the available scene selections - there are 14 to choose from and they really do aid in taking fantastic pictures. The menu is easy to navigate through and the screen is large and bright. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: CFrieberg

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this camera for years, it was the best point and shoot camera ive ever had. It had many settings but no manual mode that I remember. So if youre a pro, you'll probably be disappointed, but if you know nothing about cameras and just want to capture your family vacations/milestones/every day life, this is perfect plus 1080p recording. I loved it for years, but just sold it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased three of these cameras. The first was as a gift for my wife who wanted a decent camera that was simple to use. This camera takes great pictures and is very simple to use. I purchased an underwater enclosure for it and used it for SCUBA diving the Caribbean. It works very well in low light settings and the flash is powerful enough for underwater shots (within 3' of subject). It takes very good video 1080i, but this does tend to drain the battery quicker (no surprise there). All in all a very good little camera.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I am Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several compact cameras in my life, but this wow for the price i paid (172 us Dollars) Pictures are amazing, at first is kinda hard to use, but in 5 minutes or so you will be taking pictures like a pro it comes with pretty amazing features like HDR, background defocus, and when you take pictures in sequence it makes an effect of 3d animated picture with the accelerometer Pretty nice camera I found the battery not so good, but not bad neither, just average I really recommend this if you want superb pictures, and HD video better than canon, nikon and even olympus . Haven't tried samsung but I'm pretty sure sony is better c:
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Crisp Pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the HD videos, 16 mp pictures, and how thin, yet durable it is. It's much more convenient than having a giant Canon camera. It can fit in your pocket and is ready to go. My only complaint is it's hard to download the videos onto the computers. I'm still trying to figure out how to do that. I own a Mac and the videos cannot download on my iPhoto as the other cameras could. Instead, I have to download them on iMovie for some reason and I have to download all or none of the videos. Still, I love this camera to pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Inuyasha491

customer_reviews.title: bad pic quality in zoom
customer_reviews.text: I have this camera and the camera will not focus in zoom only focuses while not in zoom so It gets 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Budgiebonkers

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber Shot SDCWX9 16.2 MP
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with this camera. I bought it so I'd have an easy camera to take along and not have to lug around my big camera. I am pleased with it so far. I'd have to say it's a waste to have 16.2 MP, you don't really need that many even if you do blow up your pictures. The quality of the videos are good, although the sound is not the best. It does not take the place of an actual camcorder, but to have for the spur of the moment, it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Photogirl

customer_reviews.title: I love the CyberShot! Great photos for the price and size of the camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd cybershot camera and I will stick with them from now on. The quality for the price and size is really hard to beat. The features are also so easy to use, meaning it doesn't take a lot of studying to be able to use most of the features and change the settings. Takes beautiful action shots and scenic photos. The only reason I've gotten 3 is because the megapixel change has been so much over the years.
customer_reviews.author: DWille

customer_reviews.title: Very Great For Price!
customer_reviews.text: The Sony DSC-WX9 is by far one of the best cameras ive owned, in both Video Production Quality, and Picture Quality. the best feature i love is the choice to film in AVC-HD or MP4 for better uploading to websites, i can not really see the 3D pics because i do not have a 3D television At the moment. but i will when i get the chance. the only bad side, is the Battery life, it is okay for what it is, but if your on vacation, make sure to have the USB cord and Adapter handy, especially when recording alot of videos. Aside from that, it was the best $150 i spent :)!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Exellent
customer_reviews.text: It is a great camera, I take very beautiful photos. I purchased also an extra battery to be covered all day. The sweep panorama is awesome!!!. Even my cousins that have their own digital cameras with them (not the WX9) wanted to take photos with mine during a party!! Recommended, but be careful, the exterior it's made of some kind of plastic. It's not metalic at all. I don't know why (maybe to reduce weight, cost)??. It's a very light item, not much weight.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera with reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Waited for the deals $150 (with tax) and finally got it last week. Tried it in door, night, lights on, came out good. So happy as our previous camera didn't take good in door low light pictures. This is actually out 3rd Sony Camera. All Sony camera came with same basic features which every body know how to use. I am not savvy tech or photographer, but with this camera I can also take high quality pictures easily . Thanks Amazon for carrying good quality camera.
customer_reviews.author: LynnNYC

customer_reviews.title: lots of camera in a small package
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on the purchase of my daughter's Christmas present. After much research I chose the Sony DSC WX9 because for the size and money Sony knocked this one out of the park. Read all of the features and you will not find a better deal that is easy to carry and use. I especially like the panarama/landscape feature. The pictures are great! Small, reasonably priced, feature packed and a Carl Zeiss lens! WOW is all I can say.
customer_reviews.author: luke

customer_reviews.title: SONY CONTINUES TO AMAZE
customer_reviews.text: I Love this camera! The background d-focus feature is amazing. The images are crisp and clear with amazing color clarity. The capture speed is very rapid. This is important when trying to capture that precious moment that otherwise would be lost with a slow shutter speed camera. My only disappointment is that the SD Card Slot is located very close in proximity to the battery. This makes it difficult to eject at times. No regrets with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B. Family

customer_reviews.title: minor zoom issue
customer_reviews.text: I have point and shoots as well as DSLR. For DSLR I normally use Canon and found that for point and shoot Sony is better specially because the last longer. Great camera, great picture quality, great video HD shooting in 720/30p mode. The only drawbacks is a strange vibration on the zoom when you are using it for video shooting, it happens when you are zooming away at the very end, and that you can only charge the battery inside the camera (tried charging it on older Sony charger and doesn't work).
customer_reviews.author: chaix

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have a Canon T2i and 40D which I use for professional photography and videos. I bought this Sony digital camera for vacations and snowboarding. The camera is extremely portable, convenient, and packs many useful features that make the photos of very high quality. The images from the camera are some of the best I have seen on a non-DSLR modern camera. Most point and shoot cameras have lousy lenses and take mediocre photos. This camera does no such thing. Great price, great camera. Must have.
customer_reviews.author: DMM

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had two of these cameras and both broke within a couple of months. With the first camera after a couple days of heavy use the lens would not retract. I returned and got a replacement within a couple days. The replacement camera worked great for a few weeks and took great pictures. Then after a few weeks of the camera not being used I go to use it and the internal LCD screen was cracked. It was never dropped or mishandled, just sat on a shelf for a couple weeks in between uses. This is the last Sony camera I will ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jasher

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, versatile, great photos
customer_reviews.text: After much research, selected Sony Cybershot over other brands because (1) compact size (2) excellent reviews, (3) versatile features - auto and manual, (4) Sony reputation. Product has met all our expectations and then some. Our family is professional photographers with extensive experience in film cameras & darkroom. We are very happy with quality of photos from Sony Cybershot.
customer_reviews.author: walterco-sd

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cam for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm gonna make it short: PROS: - amazing daytime photos with vibrant colors. - nice slow syncro flash mode. - video quality is awesome. - the price is unbeatable. - Nice panoramic photos CONS: - slow and lagged user interface. - microphone sucks. any simple breeze will cause distortion in sound. if you want a camera to use at clubs, bars or other loud places, this one in not for you. - backlit sensor almost makes no difference. still very grainy photos in Twilight Handheld mode. - does not come with a case - you can hear the lens motor in videos when zooming in/out
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: Great cyber shot camera
customer_reviews.text: I love to take photos and I personally have a pentax kx for my more professional photography work, but for parties or trips I use this on the go camera because is very flexible and its auto function works really well, all the pics are in HD and if you are into 3d you can shoot in 3d too. I recommend this camera for the pictures you'll be getting and of course the built quality sony is known for.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: SONY DSCWX9 Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera malfunctioned for me the third time I used it ($145 new on AMAZON)...The viewfinder showed a bunch of "lines" and no picture.....I contacted SONY Repair and sent the camera back...They told me that somehow, the camera was damaged and that it would cost me $214 to get it fixed!!!!!..Warranty would not cover it....This was only the third time I used this camera and it was never dropped or even laid on a hard surface.....Yet another tale of a huge company that has lousy customer service and doesn't stand behind its products....Stay clear of SONY....And this camera !...Ken Snyder...bigk358@tds.net
customer_reviews.author: K. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: what can I say - I LOVE THIS CAMERA. It takes great pictures indoors and outdoor; videos are good. It is HD which is great, takes fantastic panoramic shots (if I could just find a way to print them); will be taking on another trip with me and cannot wait to use it. It is easy to use, and fantastic quality - would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. It takes great pictures. I still don't know how to use all the features. Recommend buying the accessories at the same time. Buy extra memory card and battery. Keep extra battery charged and handy for the battery in the camera runs down in a few months of non use.
customer_reviews.author: Larry789

customer_reviews.title: Sony CyberShot DSC-WX9
customer_reviews.text: This camera is for people who don't want to invest their brain & time in understanding DSLR but want more or less the same quality picture. Plus point: CMOS sensor are well known to capture more picture information. hence picture is good in low light, more color depth, blazing fast. DSLR feature: background de-focus, bigger aperture, image stabilization (improved), etc Few feature i liked: Sweep panorama (3D), Full HD recording, 3D (but need a 3D TV to view), price :) minus point: buttons are small but not tough to handle, zoom button is awkwardly placed.. Still i'm exploring new feature :) Please note i didn't talk about MP.. its not my priority :)
customer_reviews.author: Birat

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous camera! Small and compact and yet takes great photos, including low light. It also has numerous functions to customize your photo so it is not simply a point and shoot. It is an ideal camera for the beginner who wants to look like a semi-pro!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: distorts images
customer_reviews.text: it's ok but distorts images compared to reality and the older model that I still have. objects closer to the camera tend to be much larger than the objects just behind them, like looking down a empty road going into the horizon
customer_reviews.author: Pier

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, especially for a novice
customer_reviews.text: This has been an outsanding camera for us. It has plenty of options to select for more control, but it allows for easy use and fast picture taking. I would highly recommend this to anyone. It also takes great HD video clips, but it wears the batteries down. We bought a couple extra batteries at the same time so we'd be prepared at all times.
customer_reviews.author: GEA

customer_reviews.title: I love the Cybershot
customer_reviews.text: I've owned nothing but Sony Cybershots and they just keep getting better which each model. The thing I like about the Cybershot is you can go into a picture you just took and resize, shift, zoom and adjust and it re crops the image right then and there. No need to do it with software. Just get the image as you can center and perfect it afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Cygarbuff

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for such a good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for gift to my friend which works great! Pics are very good, my friend loves this camera. Although we are not experts in taking some great pics but it works great for regular usage or party occasions.We even tried printing on regular photo papers without modifying the picture and it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nagaraju

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-WX9 16.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Still Camera with Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 5x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from Amazon. The red colour is very nice. It has a metalic look and feel to it. The camera takes very nice pictures and videos. The only negative is the fact that the zoom is not very powerful. Its small and fits into a pocket or handbag easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rev

customer_reviews.title: It's 2016 and it is still working great! Good old Sony
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for my Sony which was stolen on a trip. Paid $144.99 in 2011. It's 2016 and it is still working great! Good old Sony!!!
customer_reviews.author: JinSh

customer_reviews.title: Good specs and price but SLOW operation
customer_reviews.text: This camera has great specs and price but has a really slow processor. It needs maybe 2 seconds between photos and takes 3 seconds to start recording video. WIth this lag I often missed the action I was trying to record. Also its low-light photography was poor - nothing compared to a Canon. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: J.Murphy

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3 camera like this. Love it and have given to friends
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3 camera like this. Love it and have given to friends. While I have newer cameras, this is an excellent goto and carry camera. Easy to use and excellent results. Has everything and more on it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Jones

customer_reviews.title: The video is good. The colors are a bit intense
customer_reviews.text: The pictures turn out well, The video is good. The colors are a bit intense. The thing eats its own batter power like a maniac.
customer_reviews.author: Daring Dewback

customer_reviews.title: great camera, horrible software.
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated this camera higher if it wasn't so hard to get the photos and videos off of it and onto my Mac (HEY SONY, MAC PEOPLE TAKE PICTURES TOO!) It takes great pictures, the screen is awesome, the panorama is eezy peezy lemon skweezy, and it takes multiple format memory cards.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hockenberry

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for 3 yrs & i still love it!! small takes good pics! we took all of our engagement pics with it.. it was on a tripod of course.. all of our christmas card pictures & everything!! love it..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon.Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice camera. Camera takes very sharp crisp pictures and the videos are actually very clear. Is surpising how well the videos look for being such a small camera. I like it alot. It is rechargeable so you wont be needing to waste money on batteries. If you are considering buying this product, you will not be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: good product, it was what I needed
customer_reviews.text: good product, it was what I needed. The image is sharp, perfect, very beautiful. This photographic camera is ideal, good price for very good quality. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Bought refurbished and works great.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to buy a new model since it probably will be outdated in a few years. This refurbished model works great and my friend loves it. He always wanted this model and luckily I was able to purchase it without spending a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I had this Camera Before i love The way The Pictures turn out one of The ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this Camera Before i love The way The Pictures turn out one of The best cameras out there still. I had a 20 megapíxeles but Did not compare to this Camera
customer_reviews.author: K. Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera sooooooooooooo much! In fact, we first purchased this camera as a birthday present for our college daughter and she loved it so much, i treated myself to this red one. The photo quality is indescribable -- simply awesome. I've got a "shaky" hand, and this corrects for it so my photos are actually not blurred. It is incredibly smart in detecting the kind of focus it needs for every shot and is really amazing, even in low light. AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA+++++++++
customer_reviews.author: ALai

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Very simple camera that takes nice pictures. The Exmor lens seems to do well in low light relative. The superior auto mode almost always gets a good picture, but it is very slow. Sony's panoramic mode is unique to their products. I used it on vacation with a large group of people, many with DSLR's. All thought it was great because it was so easy to get a panoramic picture.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera! It's super fast, and catches my kids mid action with very little blur. I find it easy to quickly change settings and user friendly, and a nice small size--I toss it in the diaper bag so it's always with me, On low light w/o flash, the images can be grainy, but they are in focus. In other settings, the pictures are beautiful. I love the HD video as well, it's nice that you can zoom in and out while shooting movies--and is compatible with imovie. . All in all a great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: pj'smom

customer_reviews.title: It's a good size for a point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: It's a good size for a point and shoot. The aperture could be better. Poor battery life with a slow processor leads me to not recommend this for anyone now.
customer_reviews.author: rawr its alan

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: Picked up this camera to use while traveling and to take short videos. This camera has exceeded my expectations, here's a list of why I love this camera Quick point and shoot time Great shots at low-light High quality video for such a small device Wide angle lens Easy to use panoramic shots HDMI hookup Overall for the $$$ a great little camera
customer_reviews.author: WVU student

customer_reviews.title: Beauty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera to make beauty videos and after playing with it for a while I really enjoy this camera! The screen has to be my favorite part, it reminds me of the sony flat screens, the newer ones, because its extremely crisp. Focusing takes a couple seconds from time to time and then there are moments when the focus goes...focus-pocus (it renders beyond the un imaginable). The red doesn't match the image, the red in the image is more pink. When received the red is like a apple red and rusty-ish. I gave it 4/5 because I haven't experienced it too much, I've only had it for a 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: SO MAD
customer_reviews.text: UGH!! From my knowledge, this is a brand new camera, I've only had it for a couple of months and it has stopped working for no reason! I never take it out in bad weather and I have yet to even drop it, but it won't work. The shutter is always getting stuck and now everytime I turn it on it tells me to turn it off and back on again, and after doing so it just repeats the message. I am so mad!!! I wish there was something I could do, I LOVED this camera :<
customer_reviews.author: mabelyn07

customer_reviews.title: sony dscwx9 camera
customer_reviews.text: It's fast and taking pictures at night are quick too. Meaning... some cameras I've used at night, flash, then flash a couple more times them may take the picture. I guess it's red eye reduction features. this camera just goes... "click, click" and the pic is good. No redos because people moved after the first flash... you know what I mean too, right? I like this camera and for th eprice, it's better than good. David
customer_reviews.author: David Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-Shot WX9
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera because of it's small size, and it comes with a lot of useful features. But being 70 and not having good vision, I still use the photo software on my computer to edit stuff most people could do with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: RP tech

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: I've got to rate this product well for the cost it is really fantastic, HD Video, 16.2 mega pixels, fantastic quality in high and low light, multiple options, multiple setting for all environments. Worth every penny. Easy to use. simple. The only negative (and it's not really a negative) but the flash is almost too bright. Trying to figure out how to change that but this camera is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Bill G

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my husband although I use it more than him so I can actually write this review. The camera is perfect. The pics look like they are fit for a magazine. The videos look like HD and it's very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: M Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad point-and-shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad point-and-shoot camera. Quality as expected with Sony product. Overall happy for a pocket camera i can take in my bag or pocket for quick shots.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hilyard

customer_reviews.title: Solid Camera, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera as a birthday gift for my girlfriend (who is not very technilogically adapt). It is fairly simple to use, and takes very good quality pictures. The price point was right around where I was looking, so overall I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: HoopyFrood

customer_reviews.title: The Sony DSCWX9 / BBDL 16.2 MP CMOS Sensor with 5 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera Bundle Black, its the perfect compact camara, th
customer_reviews.text: The Sony DSCWX9 / BBDL 16.2 MP CMOS Sensor with 5 x Optical Zoom Digital Camera Bundle Black, its the perfect compact camara, thats takes with a very good cuality images and videos, and i recomend it. VERY GOOD PRODUCT...
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Alberto Adarmes Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Stop working in a middle of a trip after 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Stop working in a middle of a trip after 3 years of use. I'm not sure if i'd buy a new Cyber-Shot.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio D.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty COOL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very nice. Great pictures. Haven't used the video yet. The options are endless. I love the smile setting and multiple shots setting. Small and light perfect to fit in your purse. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: G. N. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, exactly as was specified in the ad sales shipment took place smoothly, and very good product, I hope you continue to work well for consumers
customer_reviews.author: Nestor Riveros

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera and the HDMI hook up to my TV (with 6ft cable) for SLIDE SHOWS. I like all of the options and all you can do with it and the small size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great  camera
customer_reviews.text: I really love my camera.I gave it a 4 stars only because the wheel is a little difficult to work with. I am still learning this camera there is more to it than just point and shoot. settings. I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sharrose

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as old Cyber-Shot
customer_reviews.text: Blurry pictures and after few years of use the lens cap will start jamming.
customer_reviews.author: Kamran Khan

customer_reviews.title: Far beyond Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: This cam was a surprise. I own a NIKON SLR and found the images taken by this cam extremely crisp. This is a compact and small camera. The functions and panel is easy to use, shortcut to panorama mode is excellent. This cam come with lot of auto setting which allows novice to click great pics. I found its panorama feature too good and easy to use. However at low light it was difficult to focus, but that make sense. At 139$ it is a stealer.
customer_reviews.author: APS

customer_reviews.title: compact still camera
customer_reviews.text: An excellent camera for the price. Long battery life and very reliable. Excellent shots too. Wish it had a wider angle than what it has (my only complaint!). Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: SanSu

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. No complaints. Great to have both a 16MP digital camera and a hi-def video camera in such a small package. Liked it so much that I ordered another one just like it for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my wife last black friday(2011) and its still like new. It takes very good good pictures inside and out. Its very easy to use and easy to upload pics to computer
customer_reviews.author: chris16

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality photos, love the 3D Panoramic feature
customer_reviews.text: for the price this is the best quality of digital camera one can buy. + pre-flash really works.. no blinking in the photos. + really like the Panoramic feature + records HD videos, But do not expect it to focus on small object too fast, for basic home videos is great, but not for James Cameron to shoot Avatar with. Cons: The price may drop again, so if you don't NEED it wait 2 weeks, it might drop $10 more. and NO memory card, but you only need 4 GB
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: cleanest pictures
customer_reviews.text: great little camera, very bright optics does very clean pics, I broke my first one when dropped from my motorcycle, and replaced it right away with another one
customer_reviews.author: Bernard D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the pictures is great. Very good P&S camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera is incredible. Quality of the pictures is great. Very good P&S camera. Good price and delivery time.

customer_reviews.title: excellent point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: I researched this thoroughly because I consider this a major purchase. This camera is extremely easy to use and takes incredible pics and video. I cannot recommend it highly enough!

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyberific
customer_reviews.text: Have had an earlier version of the Sony Cyber Shot. Decided to upgrade and just like before.. Great pictures and video. User interface takes gettting used to but figured it out pretty quick. Solid.

customer_reviews.title: Very good compact camera
customer_reviews.text: Very good compact camera!!! Great quality pictures and many setting options. Fits in your pocket (comparable in size to a wallet). I usually use the camera on my iPhone, but use this when I want better quality pictures or video.

customer_reviews.title: Great cam
customer_reviews.text: Bought refurbished and has no problems with it. It's fairly easy to navigate and very compact, recommend buying a refurbished product from this company:-)

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR THE NON EXPERT
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Love to be able to remove the battery and place it into the chrager. Takes good pictures...not a photo expert so it's great for what I need at the price.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera - fast response - good quality pictures

I cannot seem to get the portrait/background fade thing to work consistantly but that is likely just me... The menu dial thingy that you turn is frustrating at times, but it is not a big deal. just use the menu button.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This camera has got me a lot of memories to go with following few years. Camera's picture quality is superb.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what expected
customer_reviews.text: Came as expected and ontime! Works well son uses it for vlogging it's good bc it's small and can zoom in pretty good.

customer_reviews.title: It's a sony.
customer_reviews.text: Good camera but the screen cracked when dropped - upgraded with another sony camera.

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot WX9 from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: WX9 is a fairly new device in the market (came out in March I think) and is good value for the money, considering the style, the size. The best compromise I would say for the money. If you would rather let it decide what's best, I suggest you leave it on intelligent shoot mode. If your target is stationary, then it has something one step further even. Overall, best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Haider Shah

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is a good choice! Bigger LCD, better lighting in the dark situation, image quality is better, a lot of functions improved, smaller and easy to carry. Good!

customer_reviews.text: Very well developed compact camera for the price. It has plenty of settings that make pictures come out great. I recommend this for people who just like to take great shots.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent low light , small, pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd camera I own, excellent low light camera, Warm colors!mgreat for nature and portrait shots.

customer_reviews.text: incredibly good quality, i like everything in this camera. The only thing I would like it to have more, is the ability to save videos in .wmp formad (compatible with Windows media player).

customer_reviews.title: Best camera in it's class
customer_reviews.text: Best camera in it's class. Too bad they stopped making it. The HDR function of this camera makes it totally stand out above the rest.

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I ever have
customer_reviews.text: Excellent photo and video quality. Way better than the comparable cameras. I have 3 other cameras - 8 mp Canon, 12mp Nikon S4000 (the worst camera I ever had), 12mp Olympus.... but the "Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-WX9" is way better. Won't find better product for this price....

customer_reviews.text: I have used this camera for still shots and video and I am still learning how to use all the features.

customer_reviews.text: My wife takes about 100,000 photos a year. This little gem puts up with it, and every photo is nice.

customer_reviews.title: best camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: stunning video on back screen. very good performance in low light environment like indoor. Plus the video full hd recording can par with most dvr on the market. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes a little practice to get used to, but once you master it, it's a joy to use. Takes amazing pictures and very good HD videos. The only flaw is the 5X zoom. Would be nice to have an 8x or better, but that's nitpicking. Excellent camera for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: The product was received as described in Amazon. Fast shipping. I love this camera because the pictures it takes are so beautiful and with high resolution. Extremely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Meliza

product_meta.title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-WX9 16.2 MP Exmor R CMOS Digital Still Camera with Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 5x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens and Full HD 1080/60i Video (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

Sony DSC-WX9 – unrestricted power in a compact package. With powerful features like Full HD movie for high quality movies, low light performance for improved image clarity, 10 fps to capture the precise moment, and 3D still image capture for a new way to experience your pictures, you wouldn’t believe something so compact could be this powerful. Sony DSC-WX9 Feature Highlights

16.1 Megapixel Back-illuminated “Exmor R” CMOS Image Sensor
The DSC-WX9 features a 16.1 megapixel “Exmor R” CMOS image sensor that brings out the full resolving power of the camera’s Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar lens to deliver extremely fast speed, high resolution, and stunning low-light sensitivity with improved image clarity and drastically reduced grain. In addition, the combined “Exmor R” CMOS sensor and BIONZ image processor delivers extremely fast 10fps, Anti Motion Blur, Hand-held Twilight and 1080i movie modes3.
3.0-inch XtraFine 
3.0-inch XtraFine technology gives you deeper blacks and more color in your display, all while being thinner than most LCDs.

Full HD 1080@60i
Record crystal clear movies at the highest resolution available with capabilities for 60i in 1080 AVCHD3. This provides stunning, fast motion video with less distortion for playback on your HD TV.
3D still image and panorama 
Produce awe-inspiring images with 3D still image and 3D Sweep Panorama capabilities4. Photos will take on a new dimension of creative capabilities for viewing the world in a whole new way.
iSweep Panorama 
With iSweep Panorama just press the shutter, pan the landscape and let the camera do the rest. It automatically links together each frame to produce a panoramic image. This model even detects faces and moving subjects to stitch intelligently different widths to help avoid subject distortion.
Background Defocus 
DSLR photographs are often beautiful because they blur the background, putting the emphasis on the subject. Now our point-and-shoot cameras can deliver this signature DSLR benefit. The system takes two shots, identifies the background and applies a defocused background keeping the subject crisp and clear.
Backlight Correction HDR 
Don’t miss a single detail in high contrast shots. The built in backlight correction analyzes the image and automatically adjusts accordingly to give you a perfectly lit shot. Backlight Correction HDR helps correct for this by taking three pictures at different exposure settings and processing the best elements of each into a single image for more natural looking shots.

Superior Auto Mode 
Get cleaner, more dynamic pictures and fewer missed shots. The camera automatically recognizes the correct scene mode, then quickly shoots and combines up to six shots to produce images with greater clarity, optimum dynamic range using backlight correction HDR technology and lower image noise using 6 shots layering technology. Superior Auto intelligently detects 36 scenes for still images and 44 scenes for movies, making it easy to get the best shot.
Digital Zoom 
Capturing the right shot at the right moment has never been so easy. Digital zoom brings the action up close to get that perfect shot, every time. 
Optical SteadyShot image stabilization 
Optical SteadyShot image stabilization uses a built-in gyro sensor to detect camera shake and automatically shifts the lens to help prevent blur without sacrificing image quality.
Soft Skin Mode 
Portrait subjects will love the results. Soft Skin mode recognizes skin tones and reduces the appearance of blemishes and wrinkles without affecting the rest of the shot.
Natural Flash 
Conventional point-and-shoot camera flash shots just don't capture colors the way the eye sees them. Natural Flash mode takes a reference shot without flash and then uses that reference to correct the color, for far more lifelike images.
Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar Lens with 25mm equivalent wide 5x Optical Zoom
The high-performance Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 5x optical zoom lens brings distant subjects closer for video recording as well as for outdoor, sports, and travel photos, and Close Focus shoots close-ups up to just under ½-inch from the subject. A wide angle of 25mm equivalent wide-angle lens allows you to take wider shots of the scene or group in crowded spaces.

HDMI output 
The High-Definition Multimedia Interface (HDMI) is a compact audio/video connector interface for transmitting uncompressed digital streams. HDMI connects digital audio/video sources such as a compatible camcorder, Blu-ray Disc player, a personal computer, a video game console, or an AV receiver to a compatible digital audio device and/or video monitor such as a digital television (DTV). Easily connect your Cyber-shot camera via HDMI cable to any compatible HDMI compatible device to easily enjoy and upload content6.
Smile Shutter technology
Smile Shutter technology captures a smile the moment it happens. Simply press the Smile Shutter button and the camera does the rest. You can also select adult and child priority and indicate the degree of Smile Detection Sensitivity. Intelligent Scene Recognition can be used together with Smile Shutter mode. This means that beautiful smiles can be captured with settings optimized for the particular scene, even in difficult conditions such as twilight and backlighting.
Face Detection technology
Sony’s Face Detection technology can automatically distinguish between children and adults. Face Detection technology detects up to eight individual faces and adjusts flash, focus, exposure, and white balance to help deliver crisp, properly lit images of family and friends.
Motion Detection
Motion Detection, along with Face Motion Detection adjusts ISO sensitivity and increases the shutter speed when movement is detected, reducing blur in moving subjects and faces.
Anti-blink Function
It’s frustrating to capture the perfect shot, only to review it later and discover subjects blinked during the photo. When the camera is set to Soft Snap, the Anti-blink function captures two images, recording only the photo with less squinting or blinking. If a blink is detected in other shooting modes, a warning will be displayed after you take the shot.
Sweep Multi Angle Mode 
In Sweep Multi Angle mode, the camera takes 15 images at different angles as it sweeps across the scene. By tilting the camera during playback, the camera’s Gyro Sensor detects motion and displays the image in a 3D-like view on the camera’s LCD.
Anti-Motion Blur Mode
Capture cleaner and sharper images in low light for non landscape shots. When set in Anti-motion Blur Mode, the DSC-WX9 captures six images in a fraction of a second with higher shutter speed and combines the data from all six to create a single image of extraordinary detail and dramatically reduce subject blur, beyond the capability of traditional cameras.

TransferJet technology 
TransferJet technology, developed by Sony and advanced and promoted by consortium of 18 other companies, allows you to transfer up to ten files between two TransferJet enabled devices just by touching their TransferJet logos together, without the hassle of hunting for cables or the complication of pairing5.

Compatible with PC and MAC Systems 
The high definition, AVCHD, video captured with the DSC-WX9 can be used with the provided Picture Motion Browser software1 for PC and iMovie (sold separately) for Mac systems².
Includes Sony PMB (Picture Motion Browser) Software ver. 5.51
Sony Picture Motion Browser software offers a simple, intuitive way to transfer, sort, and view your video and still images on your compatible PC. In addition, multiple output options let you burn your memories to DVD using an external DVD burning device (sold separately), as well as take advantage of one click upload to a number of popular video and photo sharing sites (such as Facebook and Sony’s Personal Space). Using the new 5.5 version also enables playback of 3D images taken on the Cyber-shot camera.
Includes Sony PMB Portable software2 
With the pre-installed Picture Motion Browser (PMB) Portable software2 the DSC-WX9 makes it easy to pre-select videos and images in the camera and conveniently upload them from the camera to a compatible PC and popular Internet sharing sites7 without the need for any additional software or install. 
 1. PMB requires Microsoft Windows XP SP3/ Windows Vista SP2/Windows 7 environments not supported. Not supported by Mac OS. 
 2. Uploading directly to the web requires PMB Portable (ver 5.5) for Windows; (ver 1.3) for Mac software and USB cable (included), and PC with internet connectivity. Windows XP SP3 64-bit and Starter Edition and Windows Vista Starter Edition environments not supported. 
 3. Movie recording is limited to 29 minute segments.
 4. 3D viewing requires 3D HDTV, a high speed HDMI cable (supporting at least 10.2 Gbps) connection and 3D glasses (all sold separately).
 5. TransferJet enabled media (sold separately) and TransferJet technology required in both devices. Interoperability and compatibility among TransferJet enabled devices may vary.
 6. HD Viewing requires an HD output adapter cable (VMC-MD3) and compatible HDTV, both sold separately.
 7. Requires compatible wireless access point(s). Some features may rely on Internet services.
feature_bullets: Exmor R CMOS sensor for low-light performance, 5x, bright lens
Full HD 1080x1920 with dual record of stills and movies
Fast capture with 10fps at full 16.2 MP resolution
iSweep Panorama for one shot landscapes
